location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: The enclosure has been transcribed separately from this item, it can be found on folios 93-93v.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy and translation (see ff. 93-93v) of Aga Mahomed Esmail's [Āghā Muḥammad Ismā’īl] letter concerning the arrangements for the payment of his pension, and his conveyance of power of attorney on Aga Mahomed Quomshea.
